def f(d, N, C, X):

	cows_placed = 1
	last_pos = X[0]
	for i in xrange(1, N):
		if X[i] - last_pos >= d:
			cows_placed += 1
			last_pos = X[i]
			if cows_placed == C:
				return 1

	return 0

N, C = map(int, raw_input().split())

X = []
for i in xrange(N):
	X.append(input())

X.sort()

start = 0
end = X[N-1]

while start < end:

	mid = (start+end)/2
	val = f(mid, N, C, X)

	if val == 1:
		start = mid+1
	else: #if val == 0:
		end = mid

print start-1
